name: Super Test World
description:
A little test game intended to get me started learning to use Godot to make more than a little tutorial project. What I've learned is that I need a better understanding of structuring a game in Godot.

To that end, I've decided to put this project on hold while I make a bunch of smaller test games to gain more of that understanding before I try to grow this any further. As such, this game is VERY incomplete. But you can fight some slimes!

This game, and all of its art and audio assets, were made by me.
